Transparency.justification: Score = 1 because 3 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Improving human care with ethical Augmented Intelligence
relevantSources.summary: Discusses Humana's approach to ethical AI and transparency in augmented intelligence applications.

relevantSources.title: Humana and IBM Watson Health Collaborate to Simplify and Enhance the Member Experience
relevantSources.summary: Details partnership using AI for greater clarity and transparency on benefits.

relevantSources.title: VP, AI Platform Engineering in Remote, Kentucky - Humana Careers
relevantSources.summary: Job posting emphasizing embedding transparency into AI platform architecture.

Transparency.findings: Humana provides several public sources describing its commitment to AI transparency, including detailed blog posts on ethical AI and transparency in member-facing applications. Job postings for senior AI roles further reinforce transparency as a core design principle.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.justification: Score = 1 because 4 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Improving human care with ethical Augmented Intelligence
relevantSources.summary: Addresses bias mitigation and fairness in AI, mentions equity concerns.

relevantSources.title: Promoting Equity in Healthcare: Humana's Approach to AI Fairness
relevantSources.summary: Detailed analysis of Humana's comprehensive AI fairness initiatives and bias mitigation strategies.

relevantSources.title: Director, Data Science in Remote, Nationwide - Humana Careers
relevantSources.summary: Job requirements include ensuring AI applications adhere to fairness principles.

relevantSources.title: Operationalizing AI Fairness in Healthcare: A Case Study From Humana
relevantSources.summary: Conference presentation on implementing fairness practices across 300+ AI models.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.findings: Humana publicly describes its systematic approach to AI fairness and bias mitigation, including operational monitoring across hundreds of models. Public job postings and conference materials demonstrate an organizational commitment to equity and practical bias mitigation strategies.

Explainability.justification: Score = 0.5 because 1 source(s) (listed below) contain only high-level principle statements.

relevantSources.title: VP, AI Platform Engineering in Remote, Kentucky - Humana Careers
relevantSources.summary: Job posting requiring expertise in embedding explainability into AI platform architecture.

Explainability.findings: The only public evidence of explainability is a job posting referencing explainability as a desired skill, with no detailed methods or tools described. No concrete documentation of explainability practices or model cards is available.

Human Oversight & Accountability.justification: Score = 1 because 3 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Humana accused of using AI to deny health insurance
relevantSources.summary: Documents Humana's stated commitment to maintaining human-in-the-loop decision-making processes.

relevantSources.title: Humana and Google Expand Partnership to Help Reduce Cost of Care
relevantSources.summary: Confirms Humana's policy of maintaining human oversight in AI clinical decision-making.

relevantSources.title: Lawsuit claims Humana uses AI to deny necessary health care services to Medicare Advantage patients
relevantSources.summary: Reports Humana's claims about human oversight in AI utilization management decisions.

Human Oversight & Accountability.findings: Multiple public sources, including news coverage and official statements, confirm that Humana maintains human oversight and review processes for AI-driven healthcare decisions. These sources detail both policy and practice regarding human-in-the-loop requirements.

Privacy & Security.justification: Score = 1 because 2 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Humana Privacy Policy
relevantSources.summary: Comprehensive privacy policy covering data collection, use, and protection practices.

relevantSources.title: Humana and Google Expand Partnership to Help Reduce Cost of Care
relevantSources.summary: Discusses HIPAA compliance and secure data storage for AI applications.

Privacy & Security.findings: Humana's privacy policy and partnership documentation provide concrete details on privacy and data protection, including HIPAA compliance and secure handling of data for AI applications. These documents address both foundational and AI-specific privacy and security requirements.

Governance & Accountability.findings: Humana publicly references its AI Ethics Operating and Governance Committees and participates in industry research on AI governance. These sources provide evidence of formal oversight and governance structures for AI within the company.

Public Commitments & External Audits.justification: Score = 1 because 2 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Improving human care with ethical Augmented Intelligence
relevantSources.summary: References Humana being first healthcare company to sign an AI pledge.

Public Commitments & External Audits.findings: Humana demonstrates public commitment to responsible AI through signing industry pledges and publishing AI principles as part of its corporate governance. These actions are documented in official company communications and governance materials.

summary.overallFindings: Humana demonstrates strong public evidence of responsible AI practices across most pillars, with detailed documentation on transparency, fairness, privacy, governance, and public commitments. The company highlights human oversight and accountability in AI-driven healthcare decisions and maintains formal governance structures. The only notable gap is the lack of concrete, public-facing documentation on explainability methods or tools, although explainability is referenced in job requirements. Overall, Humana's responsible AI posture is robust and well-documented in the majority of assessed areas.
